snippet: British business media group Informa Plc said its revenue rose 11 percent in 2016, helped by strong trading in its global exhibitions business and favourable currency impact....

headline.main: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond
headline.print_headline: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit-Hammond

lead_paragraph: British business media group Informa Plc said its revenue rose 11 percent in 2016, helped by strong trading in its global exhibitions business and favourable currency impact.
